title: MacBook Pro Exploded Build
description: Hyper-detailed MacBook Pro assembly with molten-silver elegance and a whisper of innovation.

shot.frame_rate: 60fps smooth motion for parts, 120fps on logo reveal
shot.composition: floating components align in a horizontal mid-air stack, final lid closes in slow cinematic drift
shot.camera_movement: smooth dolly glide through each layer, final slow pull-out to full laptop glow

subject.props: hovering logic board, Retina display panel, unibody aluminum shell halves, glowing Apple logo backlight
subject.description: Apple MacBook Pro assembling mid-air — precision-milled body, micro-screws, keys, and backlit logo locking perfectly

scene.location: minimal white void with floating arcs of light
scene.environment: metallic dust shimmer, soft ambient glow, faint circuit projections

visual_details.action: logic board floats into place, battery pack locks in with magnetic shimmer, keyboard clicks into frame, screen lowers slowly, Apple logo glows
visual_details.special_effects: silver particle drifts, lens flares on key clicks, soft energy wave at logo ignition

cinematography.lighting: soft directional beams reflecting off aluminum, subtle rim light around edges
cinematography.color_palette: brushed silver, deep black, cool white glow

audio.music: ambient piano with subtle electronic textures
audio.ambient: soft hum of circuits, faint wind of digital air
audio.mix_level: studio-quality, immersive spatial design
audio.sound_effects: gentle magnetic clicks, logo glow chime

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold Exploded Build
description: Cinematic assembly of luxury foldable smartphone, revealing every detail in a symphony of motion.

shot.composition: parts of the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold rise in spirals from a glowing core, locking together mid-air
shot.camera_movement: orbit sweeps through each major component, final push-out to reveal in full glory

subject.props: hovering core systems, casing shells, signature visual accents of Samsung Galaxy Z Fold
subject.description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold assembles with magnetic precision — every internal element showcased before locking into the luxury foldable smartphone shell

scene.location: digital environment with reactive holographic schematics
scene.environment: swirling light particles, slow plasma arcs, volumetric dust glow

visual_details.action: components align one by one, each lock-in triggering a ripple of light; final logo flare spreads through the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold surface
visual_details.special_effects: color-matched energy pulses, holographic reflections, dynamic light scattering in rose-gold and obsidian black with flowing glass-like light

cinematography.lighting: rim and underglow illumination, moving light sweeps highlighting contours
cinematography.color_palette: rose-gold and obsidian black with flowing glass-like light

audio.music: hybrid electronic-ambient score with evolving crescendos
audio.ambient: deep hums and faint digital winds
audio.mix_level: immersive 3D mix with deep bass impact
audio.sound_effects: mechanical clicks, magnetic thumps, cascading chimes
